title: Vault Thread-34"
author: fatcoco
txt_content:
[12:14:25 INFO]: [Vault] Checking for Updates ...
[12:14:25 WARN]: Exception in thread "Thread-34"
[12:14:25 WARN]: java.lang.NullPointerException
[12:14:25 WARN]:        at java.io.StringReader.<init>(Unknown Source)
[12:14:25 WARN]:        at org.json.simple.JSONValue.parse(JSONValue.java:50)
[12:14:25 WARN]:        at net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater.read(Updater.java:674)
[12:14:25 WARN]:        at net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater.runUpdater(Updater.java:746)
[12:14:25 WARN]:        at net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater.access$100(Updater.java:37)
[12:14:25 WARN]:        at net.gravitydevelopment.updater.Updater$UpdateRunnable.run(Updater.java:741)
[12:14:25 WARN]:        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[12:14:25 INFO]: [PlugMan] A new update has been downloaded. Please restart the server for the changes to take effect.

replies.txt_content: Vault插件检查更新，，  重启之后生效  这不是崩溃  如果重启之后还是崩溃的话就去下载之前的Vault版本并在配置文件内关闭自动更新
